text:
Hi everyone! I am working on a request from another department, that would like to get a slack notification in specific channels when we send out newsletter emails in HubSpot. Does anyone have an idea on how to set this up?
If it isnt possible they would like to get it kinda like an RSS feed on a specific webpage, so they can see all of the emails in there

I don't think this would be possible with the default blog notification email, but if you were sending the email via workflow you could probably use Ops Hub or a webhook to Zapier or another service to trigger automation steps after the email has sent. Adding a web-version URL to a row in HubDB, for example.
You can make a slack application that takes a webhook for input.

A row in HubDB sounds interesting and definitely something that could solve the problem :slightly_smiling_face: However most of our emails are send out via the email tool and not a workflow, as they are standalone newsletters. Do you know a way it could work with that?
